executive_summary.recommendation: Prioritize Python 3.13 type hints modernization (High priority, Low effort). Address deep nesting and long functions in phases.

1_python_modernization.name: Python 3.13 Type Hints Modernization
1_python_modernization.description: 52 files use deprecated typing imports (List, Dict, Optional, Union) instead of modern Python 3.10+ syntax
1_python_modernization.impact: Code less readable and doesn't leverage Python 3.10+ features

2_exception_handling.name: Generic Exception Handling
2_exception_handling.description: 1 file uses generic 'except Exception:' which catches too broad exceptions
2_exception_handling.impact: Catches unintended exceptions, makes debugging harder

3_code_complexity.name: Deep Nesting (>4 levels)
3_code_complexity.description: 64 files contain code with more than 4 levels of indentation
3_code_complexity.impact: Hard to read, maintain, and test

4_long_functions.name: Long Functions (>50 lines)
4_long_functions.impact: Difficult to understand, test, and maintain
